intro: Didelotia unifoliolata, commonly known as the single leaf didelotia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweeds and related species. The plant is characterized by its single, lance-shaped leaf that is typically arranged opposite on the stem.
